casebody.data:
No. D-2551. In the Matter of Discipline of R. Allen McCartney. 562 U.S. 815, 131 S. Ct. 407,

178 L. Ed. 2d 271,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7510. October 4, 2010.

R. Allen McCartney, of Louisville, Kentucky, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, re*272quiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
